template.name: CuPED - Flowplayer Template
template.description:
A template which produces HTML/JS/Flash output, using Flowplayer to interact with media.
Note: Adobe Flash Player 8 (or later) may be required to view the web pages produced by this template in synchrony with the embedded media. (It may be possible to view such pages with Flash Player 7, as well, although not all features may be supported; this has not been tested)

variable.name: Transcript file
variable.description: The transcript file to be turned into a web page.

variable.name: Primary tier
variable.description: The tier containing the annotations which should be given the most prominence in the resulting HTML. Only children of this tier will be displayed in the output.

variable.name: Convert media?
variable.description: Convert the media associated with the transcript into appropriate output formats. Media have to be converted at least once in order to be displayed; however, if no changes have been made to the transcript or its associated media since the last time it was processed using this template, then this conversion can likely be skipped.
variable.range: [('Yes', 'Yes, convert the media', True), ('No', 'No, skip converting the media', False)]

variable.name: Title of page
variable.description: The title of the web page being generated.
